name: rotaryencoder2
description: Rotary Encoder controls using the Linux Kernel driver for Rotaries.
author: 7h0mas-R, Just a Nerd

volumio_info.details:
Use up to 3 rotary encoders connected to the GPIOs of a Volumio system. Uses Linux kernel level drivers based on 'dtoverlay'.
Also provides a function to send commands via Websock.
Help and hardware tipps in the Documentation
volumio_info.changelog: 2.2.1: Fixed socket.io-client version mismatch causing WebSocket failures on Volumio 4
